name: Teriyaki Pork Chops
author: CheeseBaby
summary: Delicious pork chops my boyfriend, his friend, and I discovered one night with homemade French fries! Really tasty.
directions: Combine teriyaki sauce, garlic salt, and black pepper in a bowl
Place pork chops on a deep plate
Pour 3/4 of the teriyaki mixture on top
Flip pork chops to coat second side
Let marinate in the refrigerator, about 30 minutes
Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat; add pork chops, discarding marinade
Cover and cook until pork chops are browned, about 15 minutes
Flip and continue cooking until pork chops are cooked through, about 10 minutes
Uncover and pour in remaining 1/4 of the teriyaki mixture
Cover and simmer until flavors combine, about 5 minutes
